name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Rafie L. ALI, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Rafie L. ALI, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Does a sentencing judge have discretion to consider victim impact evidence where the offense is not a “crime against a person”?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
127 A.3d 1286
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Rafie L. ALI, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 2, 2015.
